channel.title: Help with setting up my server
channel.description:
Hello, I am using TorvaPkz v2 source and Team TorvaClient.
I cant acsess my router to port forward So i am using Hamachi how do i get my server online with hamachi, can someone go on t.v with me and help me edit the ips for my server to help me get it online cuz i cant use no-ip post below if u can ill pm you my t.v info
hope someone can help me ive been trying to 2 days to get it online for others to play
or if you no another way i can port forward we can do tht to

item.title: Help with setting up my server
item.dc:creator: @l33txtroll l33txtroll
item.description:
@l33txtroll wrote:

i can use no-ip now someone helped me port through utorrent

Read full topic
item.source: Help with setting up my server

item.title: Help with setting up my server
item.dc:creator: @knight12374 knight12374
item.description:
@knight12374 wrote:

Don’t know anything about this.

EXCEPT ONE THING.

The username is Admin and the password is blank

OR

The username is blank and the password is admin

Otherwise I’m lost like you. Help me?

I’m very like i need exact instructions.

Send me super-long, detailed email about starting a server from scratch, editing it, etc. and getting it set up and I give cookies?

anthonyhcktt2@gmail.com

thanks

P.S. – I have nothing, so I need the download for all the shizziles I need and stuff, and how to use it. Thanks a lot, if it works I will owe you my soul.

Read full topic
